T01TD1112E:43b-1: de wa aa ti sha ya sto tra:/
T01TD1112E:43b-3: lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa /
T01TD1112E:43b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1112E:43b-5: bcom ldan bde gshegs mngon sum ma gyur khyab 'jug min //
T01TD1112E:43b-6: tshangs pa ma yin lha chen po yang ma mthong ste ;
T01TD1112E:43b-7: / de dag gi gzugs mthu dang spyod pa bsam pa rnams //
T01TD1112E:43b-8: thos nas su la yon tan yod dam med pa dpyad //
T01TD1112E:43b-9: khyab 'jug dpung drag mtshon cha dbyug to thags par brtson //
T01TD1112E:43b-10: lha chen mi yi thod pa'i phreng ba rnams kyi bzhag / sangs rgyas cha lugs gcig tu zhi ba'i phul phyin na //
T01TD1112E:43b-11: nye bar zhi dang ma zhi gang la mchod par bya //
T01TD1112E:43b-12: khyab 'jug gis ni 'thab dka' la sogs rigs rnams brlag par gyur //
T01TD1112E:43b-13: lha chen pos ni grong khyer sum brtsegs bcom par gyur zhes grag / skem byed kyis kyang mdung thung 'jebs bsnun krung krung bsad par gyur //
T01TD1112E:43b-14: sangs rgyas nyag gcig 'gro la sman pa thams cad mdzad pa lags //
T01TD1112E:43b-15: nga yis 'di la gnod bya 'di nyid bsrung bya 'di //
T01TD1112E:43b-16: gsad bya zhes pa lha yi mchog gi gzhung lugs yin //
T01TD1112E:43b-17: sangs rgyas la ni dgra dang mdza' bshes mi mnga' bar //
T01TD1112E:43b-18: nges par legs dang mngon par mtho bas phan 'dogs mdzad //
T01TD1112E:44a-0: @44a * // khyab 'jug chig ni 'dod chags la sogs skyon rnams bskyed //
T01TD1112E:44a-1: lha chen po yi byed spyod gang yin smyon pa bzhin //
T01TD1112E:44a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyes pa ma lus sel mdzad na //
T01TD1112E:44a-3: su zhig ston pa chen por 'os pa dpyad par gyis //
T01TD1112E:44a-4: gang zhig brtse med gzhan la gnod par brtson pa dang //
T01TD1112E:44a-5: gang la 'gro ba dag ni skyabs su song gyur pa //
T01TD1112E:44a-6: 'dod chags bcas dang gang zhig 'dod chags rnam bral ba //
T01TD1112E:44a-7: de las gang zhig 'di na mchod bya soms te smros //
T01TD1112E:44a-8: brgya byin rdo rje thogs shing stobs can gshol thogs khyab 'jug 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs dang //
T01TD1112E:44a-9: skem byed mdung thung thogs shing lha chen rtse gsum mtshon thogs dur khrod gnas gyur pa //
T01TD1112E:44a-10: de dag byis pa snying brtse med pa sna tshogs mtshon thogs sdug bsngal 'jigs pas nyen //
T01TD1112E:44a-11: rtag tu srog chags 'joms par brtson pa de la mkhas pa su zhig 'dud par byed //
T01TD1112E:44a-12: gang zhig rtse gsum mi bsnams chags bcas mchan na chung ma med //
T01TD1112E:44a-13: 'khor lo mdung thung drag po dang ni bshol mi bsnams //
T01TD1112E:44a-14: nyon mongs rnam grol mkhas pa gzhan la phan 'dogs rnam par brtson //
T01TD1112E:44a-15: 'jig rten skyabs gyur drang srong de la 'dir ni skyabs su mchi //
T01TD1112E:44a-16: lha chen 'dod chags dbang gyur ngo tsha spangs shing co 'dri chung ma len par byed //
T01TD1112E:44a-17: khyab 'jug lhag par gtum zhing byas pa chud gzon skem byed rang gi gnyen yang gsod //
T01TD1112E:44a-18: dka' bzlog khro zhing ma he gsod byed ma mo rnams ni mi yi sha tshil za //
T01TD1112E:44a-19: log 'dren cha dang che yi stobs bcu ldan la nyes pa chung ngu'ang 'ga' mi mnga' //
T01TD1112E:44a-20: bcom ldan de ni bdag gi gnyen min mu stegs gzhan ngag dgra ma yin //
T01TD1112E:44a-21: de dag gi spyod gzhan yang mngon sum gyur par ma mthong ste //
T01TD1112E:44a-22: tshig dang spyod pa dag gis so so'i khyad par thos pa las //
T01TD1112E:44a-23: sangs rgyas yon tan phul du phyin la dad phyir bdag rten lags //
T01TD1112E:44a-24: bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi pha min mu stegs gzhan dag dgra ma yin //
T01TD1112E:44a-25: de bzhin gshegs des bdag nor ma stsal gzegs zan sogs kyis cang ma phrogs //
T01TD1112E:44a-26: 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan de ni gcig tu 'gro la sman mdzad gsung //
T01TD1112E:44b-0: dri med dri ma thams cad sel ba gang yin de la @44b bdag dang lags //
T01TD1112E:44b-1: gang zhig rtag tu phan dgyes rgyun du 'gro la phan 'dogs mdzad //
T01TD1112E:44b-2: gang zhig 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnam mang gdungs pa bde mdzad dang //
T01TD1112E:44b-3: gang zhig shes bya mtha' dag lag mthil bzhin du gsal mkhyen pa //
T01TD1112E:44b-4: drang srong mnyam med rgyu mnga' de la glo ba dad par gyur //
T01TD1112E:44b-5: snying nas dad dam ji ltar dga' ba dang //
T01TD1112E:44b-6: the tshom gyis sam gzhan gyi ngor yang rung //
T01TD1112E:44b-7: gang zhig thub dbang zla ba der phyag byed //
T01TD1112E:44b-8: des ni lha yi bde ba phun tshogs thob //
T01TD1112E:44b-9: gna' sngon khyab 'jug 'di yis 'jig rten skye rgan na 'chi'i dbang gyur thob nas su //
T01TD1112E:44b-10: mi rnams bskyab phyir rmad byung blo yis snying brtse brtson pas sh'akya'i rigs rgyas par //
T01TD1112E:44b-11: goo ta mar 'khrungs sa stengs 'jig rten 'dir ni sangs rgyas gyur par grag ces thos //
T01TD1112E:44b-12: skye bo nyon mongs blun zhing rmongs pas ston pa phan 'dogs lags par ma 'tshal grang //
T01TD1112E:44b-13: gang tshe 'dod chags zhe sdang gis ni lha min khyim nas rin chen phrogs pa dang //
T01TD1112E:44b-14: chags pa'i blo gros kyis ni ngan g-yo byas nas sa dag phrogs par gyur kyang ni //
T01TD1112E:44b-15: de tshe khyab 'jug ma grol bzhin du skye bo blun po rnams ni mchod phyag 'tshal //
T01TD1112E:44b-16: sangs rgyas nges par rnam grol gyur kyang skye bo phal cher rmongs pas phyag mi 'tshal //
T01TD1112E:44b-17: sa 'di rgya mtsho bzhi yi ska rags gtams pa'i ljid kyis ni //
T01TD1112E:44b-18: lci lci ltar 'dug khyab 'jug byin yang stobs chen sdug bsngal gnas skabs gyur //
T01TD1112E:44b-19: thub pa la ni rdul tsam phul bas rgyal po mya ngan med pa yis //
T01TD1112E:44b-20: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thel gyi 'od zer gos can sa stengs mtha' dag thob //
T01TD1112E:44b-21: bdag ni sangs rgyas phyogs mi 'dzin //
T01TD1112E:44b-22: ser skya sogs la mi sdang yang //
T01TD1112E:44b-23: gang zhig rigs par ldan pa'i tshig / de nyid ston par yongs su 'dzin //
T01TD1112E:44b-24: 'di ltar su yang rung ste nges par kun mkhyen dang //
T01TD1112E:44b-25: 'gro la gcig tu phan 'dogs mdzad pa'i lugs che ba //
T01TD1112E:44b-26: de dag blo gros zhib mo'i mig gis btsal nas su //
T01TD1112E:44b-27: bsten par bya yi gzhan dag mkhas la ci zhig mkho //
T01TD1112E:44b-28: gang la skyon kun yod min la //
T01TD1112E:44b-29: yon tan thams cad yod gyur na //
T01TD1112E:44b-30: tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che //
T01TD1112E:44b-31: de yang bdag gi ston pa yin //
T01TD1112E:44b-32: gang la skyon ni mi mnga' zhing //
T01TD1112E:45a-2: thams cad mkhyen dang thugs rje can //
T01TD1112E:45a-3: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T01TD1112E:45a-4: pad+ma kha bye rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring spyan mnga' ba //
T01TD1112E:45a-5: bstod pa'i chu klung stong gis rgya mtsho de ltar bstod bgyis pa //
T01TD1112E:45a-6: bdag gi tshig gis bskrun pa'i dge ba cung zad ci mchis pa //
T01TD1112E:45a-7: des ni sems can thams cad bde ba dag dang ldan gyur cig / lha las phul du byung ba'i bstod pa slob dpon bde byed bdag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01TD1112E:45a-9: // / rgya gsar gyi mkhan po sarba dzny'a de wa dang /
T01TD1112E:45a-10: lo ts'a ba bande rin chen mchog gis bsgyur /
T01TD1112E:45a-11: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs rakshi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
